title: Top Gear Australia
overview: A new Australian version of Top Gear, the globally acclaimed series known for its adrenaline-fuelled adventures and outrageous challenges, is parking itself on Paramount+ Australia in 2024. The series will be produced by BBC Studios local production arm.It wouldn't be Top Gear without the high-octane antics, so rest assured, they aren't going anywhere. But in 2024, the mechanics behind Top Gear Australia have given the series an epic tune up, introducing three new hosts. In the driver's seat is music composer and car enthusiast, Blair Joscelyne, loveable larrikin Beau Ryan and Jonathan LaPaglia.
